mapper.select: SELECT c.cm_name AS category_name, SUM(e.expense_sum) AS total_expense FROM expense e JOIN category_main c ON e.cs_in = c.cm_in WHERE e.expense_date >= CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AS DATE) AND e.expense_date < DATE_ADD(CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AS DATE), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND e.member_in = #{memberIn} GROUP BY c.cm_name ORDER BY total_expense DESC

SELECT c.cm_name AS category_name, SUM(e.expense_sum) AS total_expense FROM expense e JOIN category_main c ON e.cs_in = c.cm_in WHERE e.expense_date >= DATE_SUB(CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AS DATE), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND e.expense_date < CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AS DATE) AND e.member_in = #{memberIn} GROUP BY c.cm_name ORDER BY total_expense DESC

SELECT c.cm_name AS category_name, DATE(e.expense_date) AS expense_date, SUM(e.expense_sum) AS total_expense FROM expense e JOIN category_main c ON e.cs_in = c.cm_in WHERE e.member_in = #{memberIn} AND MONTH(e.expense_date) = #{month} AND YEAR(e.expense_date) = #{year} GROUP BY c.cm_name, DATE(e.expense_date) ORDER BY expense_date DESC, total_expense DESC
